| HistoryText             = The Fathers were the founders of the colony of ageless beings known as [[La Hacienda]]. Because they drank the water of life instead of bathing in it, they were transformed into purple ogres. When [[Franklin Armstrong Schist (Earth-616)|F. A. Schist]] found La Hacienda and wanted to buy their water of life, they offered him a bottle of it to drink, transforming him into one of them{{r|Man-Thing #8}}.
